name: ShapeFont
description: This object represents the font attributes (font name, font size, color, etc.) for a TextRange in the Shape.

properties.name: bold
properties.description: Represents the bold status of font. Returns null the TextRange includes both bold and non-bold text fragments.

properties.name: color
properties.description: HTML color code representation of the text color. E.g. #FF0000 represents Red. Returns null if the TextRange includes text fragments with different colors.

properties.name: italic
properties.description: Represents the italic status of font. Return null if the TextRange includes both italic and non-italic text fragments.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents font name (e.g. "Calibri"). If the text is Complex Script or East Asian language, represents corresponding font name; otherwise represents Latin font name.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Represents font size in points (e.g. 11). Return null if the TextRange includes text fragments with different font sizes.

properties.name: underline
properties.description: Type of underline applied to the font. Return null if the TextRange includes text fragments with different underline styles.
